talk_1020:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting><clr:ffff>Your Energy Cell has been expanded to
the maximum extent possible. <sp:5:0:0>It will not
support more Energy Wells.<sp:0:4:0>But you may still find yourself with surplus
<clr:0000>crystallized charges<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I will instead accept <clr:0000>crystallized charges<clr:ffff>
for your choice of <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff>.
Com_Talk_12:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>You may select a Zonai device
in exchange.
talk_1021:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>Would you like to trade now for a
<clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff>?
talk_1022:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0800><clr:ffff>Your <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff> has been expanded to
the maximum extent possible.<sp:0:4:0>I will still trade crystallized charges for
your choice of Zonai device.
talk_1023:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>Will you trade crystallized charges for
a Zonai device?
talk_1024:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>I am unfortunately out of stock right now.<sp:5:0:0>
I can show you examples of the kinds of
things I can trade in the future.
talk_1025:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>I am out of stock right now. <sp:5:0:0>Would you
like to see samples of what I will have
in the future?
talk_1026:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701>Zonaite <clr:ffff>can be excavated even in the
<clr:0000>mining cave<clr:ffff> on this island.<sp:0:4:0>Though there is very little left there.<sp:5:0:0>
It is unlikely you will find enough to
produce an <clr:0000>Energy Well<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Greater concentrations can be found in
the <clr:0000>distant depths of the world below<clr:ffff>.
It was originally mined from there.
talk_1027:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>An <clr:0000>Energy Well <clr:ffff>can increase the <clr:0000>capacity<clr:ffff>
of the Energy Cell you are carrying.<sp:0:4:0>This increased <clr:0000>capacity <clr:ffff>will allow you to
use <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> for longer periods.<sp:0:4:0>I can produce these <clr:0000>Energy Wells <clr:ffff>for you<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
if you bring me <clr:0000>crystallized charges<clr:ffff>.
talk_1028:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>I encourage you to visit whenever you
have collected <clr:0000>crystallized charges<clr:ffff>.
talk_1030:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>Yes. <sp:5:0:0><clr:0000>Crystallized charges<clr:ffff> are materials
used in the creation of <clr:0000>Energy Wells<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>They are made by processing <clr:0000>zonaite<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
It is a unique mineral found <clr:0000>deep beneath
the surface below<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>You can bring any <clr:0000>zonaite <clr:ffff>mined
from the Depths to a <clr:0000>Forge Construct<clr:ffff>
for processing.
talk_1007:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>Shall I begin <clr:0000>production<clr:ffff>? <sp:5:0:0>Or would you
like me to explain <clr:0000>crystallized charges<clr:ffff>?
talk_1008:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>Shall I begin <clr:0000>production<clr:ffff>? <sp:5:0:0>Or would you
like me to explain <clr:0000>Energy Wells<clr:ffff>?
talk_1009:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>That completes the explanation. <sp:5:0:0>Shall I
<clr:0000>produce<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>Energy Wells <clr:ffff>for you?
talk_1010:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>Yes. <sp:5:0:0><clr:0000>Crystallized charges<clr:ffff> <sp:5:0:0>are materials
used in the creation of <clr:0000>Energy Wells<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>They are made by processing <clr:0000>zonaite<clr:ffff>.
talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I can take your <clr:0000>crystallized charges <clr:ffff>and
use them to produce <clr:0000>Energy Wells<clr:ffff>.
talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>This is a <clr:0000>crystal refinery<clr:ffff>. But you do not
seem to have an <clr:0000>Energy Cell <clr:ffff>to work with.
talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can do nothing for you if you do not
have an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Find one somewhere on this island and
see me again afterward.
talk_1015:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice><clr:ffff>The production will require<sp:5:0:0> at least <clr:0000>100<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>crystallized charges<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Return when you have collected a
sufficient amount.
Com_Talk_07: <clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>I am out of that right now. <sp:5:0:0>My apologies.
talk_1016:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>One note regarding the <clr:0000>zonaite <clr:ffff>required
to process <clr:0000>crystallized charges<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The mines on this island have nearly run
dry. <sp:5:0:0>I doubt there is enough left to
produce an <clr:0000>Energy Well<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>But there is more to be had. <sp:5:0:0>Check the
<clr:0000>distant depths of the world below<clr:ffff>. That
is its original source.
Com_Talk_08:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS><clr:ffff>You do not have enough crystallized
charges.
Com_Talk_38: <clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:ffff>All trade items are out of stock.
talk_1019: <clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy><clr:ffff>I would enjoy further visits from you.
